open-tickets.ticket_title: I give Up...I want a refund

ticket_comments.comment:
<p></p><p>It is extremely distastful that a theme that cost nearly $100 has so many issues which i have been battling for more than 1 week. Even though before buying the theme i alerted you guys about an issue which shouldnt even be a issue.."menu not showing on mobile devices"</p>
<p>I should have taken this as a red flag to aviod this theme but i had hope which is no more with my tight deadline</p>

<p>Yes, please do as needed.</p>

<p>You're right, I refreshed the permalinks.</p><p>So the search term "beatles" should return all the products in this page "<a href="https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/the-beatles/" rel="nofollow">https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/the-beatles/</a>" and also those that contain the work beatles in the description or title.</p>

The artist pages no longer work, they return 404 (e.g <a href="https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/terell-stafford/" rel="nofollow">https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/the-beatles/</a><br>2. Search wont no longer find search terms in the body</p><p><br></p>

<p>Please try the following :</p><p>Όνομα χρήστη FTP: support@vinylparadise.gr<br>Διακομιστής FTP: ftp.vinylparadise.gr<br>Θύρα FTPS ρητά &amp; FTP:  21<br></p><p>Password: <strong>reUo3o+@tHE]</strong><br></p>

<p>OK, I will remove the previous filter and optimize the new one.</p>
<p>Talk to you soon</p>

<p>Unfortunately yes, the client wants to include the SKU and the Label.. which I'm sure it's going to make it slower :P</p><p>Username FTP: maria@vinylparadise.gr<br>Server FTP: ftp.vinylparadise.gr<br>Port:  21</p><p>Password: reUo3o+@tHE]<br></p>

<p>Sorry, I forgot you have no access to the website.</p><p><a href="https://vinylparadise.gr/wp-admin" rel="nofollow">https://vinylparadise.gr/wp-admin</a><br></p><p><strong>user: </strong>support<br></p><p><strong>pass:</strong> 7@(&amp;sZ3EjT*#cRt@3R#(4K)e</p>

<p>You can see in this video: <a href="https://go.screenpal.com/watch/cTew1NniGnE" rel="nofollow">https://go.screenpal.com/watch/cTew1NniGnE</a></p><p>It loads indefinitely, I never got results. :\</p><p></p>

<p>I've installed WP Super cache in case it helped but still nothing.. </p><p>If you make a search it works for you? For example "beatles". For me it just keeps loading and nothing happens :(</p><p></p>
<p>Hello Constantin,</p><p>It's still extremely slow :\ And the website is on a semi-dedicated server.</p><p>Any cache plugin that you can recommend? What could be the issue for it being so slow?</p>

<p>Hi Maria,</p>
<p>Sorry for he delay I will get back to you ASAP</p>

<p>OK, I will optimize the search query today and get back to you.</p>
<p>Talk to you soon!</p>
<p>Yes I have :\</p>
<p>Did you installed the new version of Vonzot I provided?</p>
<p>Hey Constantin,</p><p>I've installed the child theme but the search is either too slow or not working :\</p>
<p>Here are the child theme files. Let me know if you need anything else.</p><p>Thanks!</p>
<p>Hello Constantin!</p><p>Any news on this? </p><p>p.s. I'm guessing you found my not so perfect code in the functions.php file :P</p><p></p>

<p>Hello!</p><p>I've created some WooCommerce custom taxonomies per client request. So for example you can view all records associated with a specific artist. </p><p>But I'd like the artist name to also be searchable and return all records with this artist name. <strong>For example</strong> when someone searches "<em>beatles</em>" it should return all records containing the word beatles, whether as the <strong>artist term</strong>, <strong>product name</strong>, or <strong>product description</strong>. </p><p>As it is now it won't return Records containing the word "beatles" if it's an Artist taxonomy term.</p><p>I hope I'm not confusing you :)</p><p>I'm transferring 80$ now through PayPal. Could you by any chance send me an invoice? I have a Greek VAT ID. Let me know!</p><p>Thanks!</p>

I've already tried using some code snippets in the fuctions.php file but they don't seem to work correctly. I've also tried making SKU and a couple more taxonomies searchable. </p><p>Do you need access to the website? I've sent you logins before but let me know if you need them again :)</p><p>Maria</p>
